text: Cilia Adela Gavidia Flores de Maduro (born 15 October 1956) is a Venezuelan lawyer and politician. She is married to the President of Venezuela Nicol√°s Maduro. In 2013, she became the First Lady. In 2015, she became a deputy in the National Assembly of Venezuela. She was president from 2006 to 2011, for her home state of Cojedes. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Venezuelan lawyers Category:Venezuelan politicians Category:First Ladies of Venezuela
title: Cilia Flores
